thread.title: Central Catholic thrashes Hoover behind Colangelo's big night
thread.title_full: Central Catholic thrashes Hoover behind Colangelo's big night

title: Central Catholic thrashes Hoover behind Colangelo's big night
text: Central Catholic thrashes Hoover behind Colangelo's big night Jack of all trades. Master of all. That's what makes Central Catholic senior John Colangelo one of the most dangerous football players in Stark County. Colangelo scored touchdowns in three different ways to lead the Crusaders to a 47-14 win over Hoover Friday night. Comment Posted Oct. 17, 2015 at 12:49 AM Posted Oct. 17, 2015 at 12:49 AM » RELATED CONTENT Click here to read the story on FridayNightOhio.com .
